name: Illusi
description:
Illusi

There is only one character. The word 'Illusi'. 

A and D to move.

Space to jump.

Shift to sprint.

S to show off letters.

W to show off letters backwards.

Credits:

Game design and programming, Mike Bailey.

Letter models from Unity Asset Store:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/futuristic-letter-models-176110

Atmospheric sound from freesound.org, creative commons livence:

https://freesound.org/people/digifishmusic/sounds/69569/
